title: december 1: ice ice (land) baby (with Chloe Moriondo)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the independence of Iceland. She goes back to the beginning of civilization on the island and through its history till today! For this day in music, special guest Chloe Moriondo details her first ever live show. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
